https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Beyond That Wasteland is a poetic depiction of being in a borderland, in the wake of the disaster. A place where one is forced to stay awake in order not to perish. It is a timeless ninja epos about facing an ultimate, life-changing decision - to resist or surrender. Beyond That Wasteland
